comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Monument in Leipzig commemorating the Battle of Leipzig, 1813; completed in 1913 for the 100th anniversary of the battle. Wikipedia article: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monument_to_the_Battle_of_the_Nations

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Architect: Bruno Schmitz. Style: Wagnerian (Titanic Teutonic).
A close-up view:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445881114/in/photostream/]

A Flickr photo from 2006 shows an early stage of the cleaning and restoration project that is scheduled to be completed by 2013, the monument's centennial year:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/courtneycj/3338971597/]
